name: Tri-Brigade Rendezvous
text: Target any number of linked Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Winged Beast monsters you control; they gain 700 ATK until the end of this turn. If a linked Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Winged Beast monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use each effect of "Tri-Brigade Rendezvous" once per turn.
